clue.en: Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
clue.zh: 走了；过去了；消失了；通过了；去世了。

clue.en: A person who lives near a given place.
clue.zh: 住在某个地方附近的人。

clue.en: Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
clue.zh: 走了；过去了；消失了；通过了；去世了。

clue.en: A website that allows users to reflect, share opinions, and discuss various topics in the form of an online journal, sometimes letting readers comment on their posts. Most __s are written in a slightly informal tone (personal journals, news, businesses, etc.)
clue.zh: 一个允许用户以在线日记的形式反思、分享观点和讨论各种主题的网站，有时还让读者对他们的帖子发表评论。大多数博客都是以稍微非正式的语气撰写的（个人日记、新闻、商业等）
